_header: Holy ghost thy might / Us wis and read and dight
Note: For a somewhat earlier text see 5698.
Title(s): The sawe of Seint bede prest
Subjects: Bede the Venerable, saint; death, meditations on
_description: ‘þe sawe of Seint bede prest’ — 373 lines, mostly in 6-line stanzas

BodDig86.First Lines:
Holi gost þi miȝtteOus wisse and rede and
                    diȝte…
BodDig86.Last Lines:
…Among þe hengles briȝteAmen so hit be
                    mote
BodDig86.Attributed Title:
Her biginneþ þe sawe of Seint bede prest (f.
                    127v)
